channel.title: CVE Feed for binary-husky -- gpt_academic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for binary-husky -- gpt_academic

item.title: CVE-2024-31224|2024-04-08T15:24:01.084Z -- binary-husky -- gpt_academic
item.description: GPT Academic provides interactive interfaces for large language models. A vulnerability was found in gpt_academic versions 3.64 through 3.73. The server deserializes untrustworthy data from the client, which may risk remote code execution. Any device that exposes the GPT Academic service to the Internet is vulnerable. Version 3.74 contains a patch for the issue. There are no known workarounds aside from upgrading to a patched version.
